Description.Text: Facilities Guest accommodation comprises 117 rooms. Services and facilities at the hotel include a restaurant, a dining area, a laundry service and a conference room. Wireless internet access is available to guests in the public areas. Those arriving in their own vehicles can leave them in the car park of the hotel. Rooms Rooms feature air conditioning and a bathroom. Cots are available for younger travellers. A fridge and a tea/coffee station are provided as standard. An ironing set is also available for guests' convenience. Little extras, including internet access, a telephone, a TV and WiFi, contribute to a great stay. Amenities in the bathrooms include a shower. A hairdryer and bathrobes are available for everyday use. Sports/Entertainment The accommodation offers attractions including sport and entertainment opportunities. The establishment features an indoor pool. The hot tub is the perfect place to relax. Meals Breakfast can be booked.
